title: Kai Xiang Lim
text:
Hi! I am a senior data scientist working on real-world data in the pharmaceutical and healthcare sector. Coming from a multidiscplinary background, my interests span across health research, causal inference, data science, statistics, genetics, and psychology.
I mainly use this website to document my learning journey as a data scientist. It consists of topics such as causal inference, machine learning, visualisation and coding tips!

title: Kai Xiang Lim
text:
üî¨Education
üíª PhD in Statistical Genetics  King‚Äôs College London | 2019 - 2023
I embarked on the journey to study the ‚Äúorigins‚Äù of self-harm using You can read my PhD thesis here.

üíª MSc Genes, Environment, and Development in Psychology and Psychiatry  King‚Äôs College London | 2017 - 2018
Inspired by my undergraduate dissertation, I pursued my interests in both mental health and genetics research here. My MSc thesis formed the foundation for my paper pulished in PLoS Medicine.

üíª BSc Psychology, University College London  University College London | 2014 - 2017
I was introduced to the world of behavioural genetics here. For my undergraduate dissertation, I used a population-based longitudinal twin cohort to study the putative causal effect of lower birth weight on ADHD symptoms across development, leading to my first academic publication.

title: Kai Xiang Lim
text:
Hi! I am a senior data scientist working on real-world data in the pharmaceutical and healthcare sector. Coming from a multidiscplinary background, my interests span across health research, causal inference, data science, statistics, genetics, and psychology.
I mainly use this website to document my learning journey as a data scientist. It consists of topics such as causal inference, machine learning, visualisation and coding tips!
I code in R, SQL and Python.

title: Kai Xiang Lim
text:
üíä Pharmaceutical industry experience
Senior Data Scientist, Novo Nordisk  London, UK | September 2024 - present
I further pursued my interest in causal inference in Novo Nordisk, R&D Digital Hub in London. Here, I am placed in the real-world evidence area, focusing on generating real-world evidence using real-world data.
üí°Tech stack: R, SQL, Cypher, Azure DevOps
Keywords: Target trial emulation, targeted learning, knowledge graph.

Analytical Data Scientist, Roche  Welwyn Garden City, UK | 2023 - 2024
I started my data science career in the pharmaceutical industry at Roche. Here, I gained experience in clinical reporting using both early and late phase clinical trial data.
üí° Tech stack: R, SAS, git, snakemake, RShiny apps
Keywords: R package development, end-to-end clinical reporting, SDTM, ADaM.
